ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Re-newb
ygData.msgSnippet: Did I mention there is now a guild bank so officers can place things in the bank and specify who can get it out? That s a pretty neat feature. luv, -Su ... = =
ygData.messageBody:
Did I mention there is now a guild bank so officers can place things in the bank and specify who can get it out? That's a pretty neat feature.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-03-20, 09:59:00 you wrote: =======

>Well Su got most of it that I know of except the part about the guild
>messaging. I need to check that out. Maybe it will help in recruitment
>for Mystic Crusaders!
>
>I would suggest trying a site like Allakhazam
>(http://everquest.allakhazam.com/) and the main EQ site.
>
>
>
>EverQuest@yahoogroups.com wrote:
>
>====== At 2005-03-18, 18:31:00 you wrote: =======
>
>
>>>I have been gone from EQ for a long time ( a year in MAY). I have
>>>played occasionally since then, but never "full-time" since MAY like
>>>I used to...I hear something have changed
>>>

>>>since May of last year..I know of a couple expansions..but not sure
>>>much else. I want to be informed before i return to EQ
>>>again "fulltime" and not feel like a newb again (is a nasty feeling)
>>>
>>>Thanks
>>
